page.title: 05RELIGION _ St.Marys Church
page.content: { St. Marys Church in Essendon}was first built in the 16th century. It is built of flint and mortar. It has a tower with a spire and is built in Victorian style. The church is under_ going renovation and the tower is having the most repair. So far Â£30,000 has been raised. There is also a place called Essendon in Australlia. When a font was delivered to Essendon in England, a font that was supposed to go to Essendon in Australlia was also delivered to the village. It was never sent to Australlia and now Essendon church England has two fonts. In the first world war the church was bombed by a Zeppelin. The eastern end of the church was destroyed and two children were killed. A plaque on the church wall is in memory of them. The cedar tree in the church_yard is over 400 years old.
